item.title: Ash Tree located on Highway land problem, 7th May
item.description:
Dead and all infection levels. Potential of tree fall also.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Ash Tree located on Highway land

item.title: Ash Tree located on Highway land problem, 7th May
item.description:
Smallish dead , L4,3 and 2 infections. Extra busy due to road works. Possibility of tree fall immediate.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 7th May
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed footway abrupt level difference with tarmac patch 2400x700x30mm stats required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
